channel.title: Language-details on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Language-details on Martian

item.title: Language Details
item.description: Tokens and Grammar The Martian language’s tokens are defined by regular expressions in its lexical scanner. The Martian syntax is specified as a YACC grammar. Symbols and Scope Symbols in Martian are identifiers for stages, pipelines, and parameters. They may comprise uppercase and lowercase letters, numeric digits, and underscores. A symbol may not begin with a numeric digit, which is reserved for number literals. The Martian lexer’s regular expression for symbols is [a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*\\b.
